posts.post_content:
I know its a Hail Mary, but this is a 2018 goal of mine and figured it cant hurt to ask.  If I am going to spend the money, I prefer something nice 1.5+ - 4.0, PSA or SGC only.  Would be an all cash deal.  Thanks

Ryan Hotchkiss
[url]rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com[/url]
That's a good goal. It's on my long-term list.  Good luck.

I'm guessing you saw the PSA PR-FR 1 at G***** @39K
Good Luck guys..i know that one has a crease, but spending that serious dough, you better get a nice one and show it to us.

[quote name="pawpawdiv9" post=1744632]I'm guessing you saw the PSA PR-FR 1 at G***** @39K
Good Luck guys..i know that one has a crease, but spending that serious dough, you better get a nice one and show it to us.[/QUOTE]

i think that plank is pretty nice for the grade

It has pen marks on it.  I called and spoke to them and they confirmed it was in fact pen.  They also decided to leave that off the description even after I advised they should add it.  

Cory Weiser

I am second underbidder on that plank. It is very nice indeed, but that kind of money, I would rather pay more and get one without a crease across the face. I was under bidder on the 1.5 that sold late last year in REA but couldn't get over the writing on back to pull that next bid. I would like a very nice example, bc if I am going to spend the money I mind as well pay more and be thrilled
We've already established that you don't like my Plank.  :D   Good luck, and be patient, there is always one in the spring REA.

Join the club!  Been searching for awhile. Would love to land one. Wish I would have gone stronger on the REA offering last fall but was on a mission trip and just lost track of it. Ah well, there’s always another one. Just depends what you want to pay.

[quote name="Sean" post=1744762]We've already established that you don't like my Plank.  :D   Good luck, and be patient, there is always one in the spring REA.[/QUOTE]

Sean, the only problem with your plank is that it's yours, meaning it's already got a home!
